content: > **current promotions** > > purchase 3 patterns and receive **10% off** > > purchase 6 patterns and receive **15% off** > > purchase 10 patterns or more and receive **20% off** **details** the pattern consists of 14 rounds crochet skill level is advanced you will need to work front and back post stitches clusters two stitches together and popcorns all abbreviations special stitches and techniques are explained in detail your gauge will determine things like hook size yardage finished size and height of stitches any of these things can be adjusted as needed using recommended thread and hook this pattern will use minimum 90 yards of thread and your finished doily will be about 6 / 15 cm in diameter **languages** download includes pdf file in english **community** join our discussion and support group for designs by nelly klos on facebook 1 *thank you very much to my testers on this pattern carol ann reddy darla dale anita aeshah haninah suhaimi micha snodderly prathibha sureshbabu and suf ea * 1 https //www facebook com/groups/nk crochet designs
